column1: 1 ^ Dòmine non est exaltátum cor meum
column4: nèqụe in mirabìlibus super me. ^ Lord
column6: nor are my eyes lofty. Neither have I walked in great matters
column7: nor in wonderful things above me.

column3: sicut ablactátus est super matre sua
column4: ita retribúțio in ánima mea. ^ If I was not humbly minded
column6: as a child that is weaned is towards his mother

column2: ex hoc nunc et usqụe in sáĕculum. ^ Let Israel hope in the Lord
column3: from henceforth now and for ever.
